Name: 222 Hearts
About the game: ■ About the game ‘222 Hearts’ is an action platformer that utilizes the dash skill. ■ Features * High speed the dash action system. * Collect 222 hearts in stages. * Including the boss stages. * Support for achievements. * Support for Steam Cloud. * Support for various OS including Windows, OSX, and Linux.
